activity: Coffee Break at Café Herr Sonnenschein
description: Relax with a cup of freshly brewed coffee and homemade pastries at the charming Café Herr Sonnenschein in the heart of Münster.

locationInfo.description: A cozy café known for its relaxed atmosphere, high-quality coffee, and delicious homemade treats.
safetyTips: Check for available seating during peak hours.
Inform staff about any dietary restrictions before ordering.

description: Take a leisurely walk through the beautiful Botanischer Garten Münster, home to diverse plant species and serene landscapes.

locationInfo.description: A picturesque botanical garden featuring exotic and native plants, ideal for a relaxing nature walk.
safetyTips: Stay on designated paths to protect delicate plants.
Check for seasonal blooms for the best experience.

description: Rent a paddle boat and enjoy a relaxing time on Aasee, taking in the scenic waterfront views of Münster.

locationInfo.description: Aasee provides an excellent setting for paddle boating with stunning city and nature views.
safetyTips: Wear a life jacket for safety.
Avoid overcrowding the boat to maintain balance.

description: Dive into the world of modern art with a visit to the Kunstmuseum Pablo Picasso, featuring unique exhibitions and collections.

locationInfo.description: A must-visit museum in Münster showcasing artworks by Pablo Picasso and other renowned modern artists.

description: Take a refreshing evening walk along the Promenade Münster, a green pathway that circles the old town.

locationInfo.description: A tree-lined promenade perfect for an evening stroll, offering beautiful sights and a relaxed atmosphere.
safetyTips: Watch out for cyclists sharing the path.
Stick to well-lit areas if walking after sunset.
